p: All experiments were performed on a fully automatic HPLC system (Agilent Technology, 1260 Infinity, USA), equipped with an online degasser, a quaternary pump, an auto-sampler, a column compartment with oven and a diode array detector (DAD) system. The analysis was performed isocratically on a C 18 analytical column (ZORBAX Eclipse plus, 250 × 4.4 mm, 5 μm). The Open LAB CDS Chemstation chromatographic software was used for HPLC data processing (version-C.01.04).
